trans-unit.source: Creates the theme-specific look for <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Decorator"></xref> types, for use with the Classic theme.
trans-unit.target: 建立佈景主題特定尋找<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Decorator"></xref>類型，以便搭配 「 傳統 」 主題。

trans-unit.source: To achieve the Classic look, specify <xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ClassicBorderDecorator.ClassicBorderBrush%2A> as the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.BorderBrush%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要達到傳統外觀，指定<xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ClassicBorderDecorator.ClassicBorderBrush%2A>為<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.BorderBrush%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.BorderBrush%2A> </xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ClassicBorderDecorator.ClassicBorderBrush%2A>

trans-unit.source: Any other brush will remove the Classic look and render a border of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border.BorderThickness%2A>, except in the case of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> elements, which always render in the Classic look.
trans-unit.target: 會移除 傳統尋找任何筆刷，並將其轉譯的框線<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border.BorderThickness%2A>，除非是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl>一定會轉譯在傳統查詢項目。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border.BorderThickness%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Object Element Usage ```   singleChild ``` ## XAML Values `theme:` An xmlns prefix for the CLR namespace.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 物件項目用法```   singleChild ``` # # XAML 值`theme:`xmlns 前置詞CLR 命名空間。

trans-unit.source: Typically, xmlns prefixes and mappings are defined in a XAML root element (not shown).
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，xmlns 前置詞和對應的定義 （未顯示） 的 XAML 根項目。

trans-unit.source: *singleChild* A single object element child, representing the object that the border is drawn around.
trans-unit.target: *singleChild*為單一物件項目子系，表示周圍繪製框線的物件。

trans-unit.source: This object must be a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.
trans-unit.target: 這個物件必須是<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: Typical child elements are either a fixed <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> (for example a <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Path>) or are a presenter or another decorator in compositing.
trans-unit.target: 典型的子元素都是任一個固定<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>(例如<xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Path>) 或展示器或另一個裝飾項目中組合。</xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Path> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ClassicBorderDecorator"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ClassicBorderDecorator"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the brush used to fill the background of the element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來填滿項目的背景的筆刷。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|, , |
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`| 、 |

trans-unit.source: The brush used to fill the background of the element.
trans-unit.target: 用來填滿項目的背景的筆刷。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ClassicBorderDecorator.Background*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ClassicBorderDecorator.Background*>相依性屬性。</xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ClassicBorderDecorator.Background*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the brush used to draw the outer border of the element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來繪製項目的外的框的筆刷。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to **true**|, , |
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為**true**| 、 |

trans-unit.source: The brush used to draw the outer border of the element.
trans-unit.target: 用於繪製項目的外的框的筆刷。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ClassicBorderDecorator.BorderBrush*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ClassicBorderDecorator.BorderBrush*>相依性屬性。</xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ClassicBorderDecorator.BorderBrush*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ClassicBorderStyle"></xref> used to draw the border of the element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ClassicBorderStyle"></xref>用來繪製項目的框線。

trans-unit.source: To achieve the Classic look, specify <xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ClassicBorderDecorator.ClassicBorderBrush%2A> as the BorderStyle.
trans-unit.target: 若要達到傳統外觀，指定<xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ClassicBorderDecorator.ClassicBorderBrush%2A>為框線樣式。</xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ClassicBorderDecorator.ClassicBorderBrush%2A>

trans-unit.source: Any other brush will remove the Classic look and render a border of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border.BorderThickness%2A>, except in the case of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> elements, which always render in the Classic look.
trans-unit.target: 會移除 傳統尋找任何筆刷，並將其轉譯的框線<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border.BorderThickness%2A>，除非是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl>一定會轉譯在傳統查詢項目。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border.BorderThickness%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|, , |
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`| 、 |

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ClassicBorderStyle"></xref> used to draw the border of the element.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ClassicBorderStyle"> </xref>用來繪製項目的框線。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ClassicBorderDecorator.BorderStyle*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ClassicBorderDecorator.BorderStyle*>相依性屬性。</xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ClassicBorderDecorator.BorderStyle*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of the border.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定框線的寬度。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|, , |
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`| 、 |

trans-unit.source: The width of the border.
trans-unit.target: 框線的寬度。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ClassicBorderDecorator.BorderThickness*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ClassicBorderDecorator.BorderThickness*>相依性屬性。</xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ClassicBorderDecorator.BorderThickness*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets the brush used to draw the border.
trans-unit.target: 取得用來繪製框線的筆刷。

trans-unit.source: This brush is used to tell <xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ClassicBorderDecorator> to draw the border according to the <xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ClassicBorderDecorator.BorderStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個筆刷可用來告知<xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ClassicBorderDecorator>繪製根據<xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ClassicBorderDecorator.BorderStyle%2A>.</xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ClassicBorderDecorator.BorderStyle%2A>框線</xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ClassicBorderDecorator>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ClassicBorderDecorator.BorderBrush%2A> is not set to ClassicBorderBrush, a flat style is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ClassicBorderDecorator.BorderBrush%2A>未設定 ClassicBorderBrush，以繪製平面的樣式。</xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ClassicBorderDecorator.BorderBrush%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage `<` *object property* `="{x:Static theme:ClassicBorderDecorator.ClassicBorderBrush}"/>` ## XAML Values *x:Static* The [x:Static Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 屬性使用方式`<`*物件屬性* `="{x:Static theme:ClassicBorderDecorator.ClassicBorderBrush}"/>` # # XAML 值*X:static* [X:static 標記延伸](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: *theme* An xmlns prefix mapping to the <xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] namespace in a specific assembly.
trans-unit.target: *佈景主題*xmlns 前置詞對應<xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes>[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]特定組件中的命名空間。</xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes>

trans-unit.source: The brush used to draw the border.
trans-unit.target: 用來繪製框線的筆刷。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
